verbs.description: [ARG0: Larry Kudlow] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] [V: made] [ARG1: his first network TV appearance as a member of the Trump administration] and fought back against selective polling when it comes to the Republican tax bill . CBS This Morning co - host Gayle King demanded : “ Mr. Kudlow , the latest poll shows that only 27 percent of Americans think that this tax bill is a good idea . Is that a good enough number for you ? ”
